1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.0.0:
Code refactor.
Improved and reorganized the configuration.
Added a configuration GUI.
Removed /rpreloadclient.
Added configurable player speed limits.
Added faster language switching.
The logo now shows up in the mod list.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.1.0: Fixed the fix of the read timeout implementation.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0.0:
Fixed the read timeout implementation and added an option to set the KeepAlive packet interval.
Removed the FMLNetworkHandler patch as it was completely unnecessary.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.0:
Minor fixes and code cleanup.
Added the option to force returning to the title screen on disconnect.
Added /rpreload and /rpreloadclient.
